comments:
Error occour when using xml data source to add data set

Steps to reproduce:
1.new a xml data source
2.new a data set
3.error occour

expected result:
xml data set can be added

actual result:
error occour

error log:
\org.eclipse.datatools.connectivity.oda.OdaException: XML data source cannot be retrieved.XML data source file is invalid or the file doesn't exist.

When DTP xml driver is updated to use plugin dependency rather than jar dependency to xerces driver, the plugin.xml files of both BIRT and DTP xml driver has not been updated. The ?useThreadContextClassLoader? element should be set to false.

traces.message: XML data source cannot be retrieved.XML data source file is invalid or the file doesn't exist.
